title: Buttons & Lace
description: I owe him a debt.  A big one.  The payment can't be settled with money or favors.  He only wants one thing.  Me.  Every action gets a reward. A button. Once I fill his jar with three hundred and sixty-five buttons, he'll let me go.  He'll let me walk away.  But I have to earn every single one.  By submitting to the darkest, cruelest, and most beautiful man I've ever known.  ** TRIGGER WARNING ** There are some dark and disturbing scenes of abuse and punishment.
author: Penelope Sky
